transcript.text: Today I'm going to tell you a story
It is the the story of Squeezie who, in 2013,
Read the comments of one of his videos
this comment had been posted by someone
who really thought I had an attention trouble
it traumatised me then because this guy had done a list of all the things
that made him think I was troubled
and since whenever I feel pain somewhere I think it is cancer
this comment affected me a lot
I had done some researches
and I finally don't think I have it
but I never was sure because you have to see a psycologist to be sure
generally it is diagnosed as a child but it can be later,
because the symptoms of this disease
everybody has them.
but a lot less intense
Let me explain myself
I had prepared this class,  I had worked on it *laughs*
sick people have three major symptoms :
lack of attention
hyperactivity
and impulsivity
aaand the bad news are
we all struggle to focus on some things
we all are sometimes hyperactive
and we all are more or less impulsive
so someone who has this trouble
might not know it for a long time
All this mean that today we are going to do a quiz
to know if we have that trouble
it was made by specialists of the TDAH
so it's not crappy
for once it's not crap!
it is not a quiz to know whether you're Slytherin or Gryffindor
but careful, even if it says you have it
you might not be
it's still an online quiz, don't be afraid
here we go!
I often make small mistakes in my work. I skim read. I tend to rush things.
Small mistakes yes.
I do not read at all.
And I do tend to rush things.
I am always fast in my life
everything has to be fast
It annoys me when I play
for instance in WoW
I always wanna be fast so I don't have any pleasure playing
This is me telling my life *laughs*
I mess up dates, get numbers wrong and fail to notice typos.
Oh no
not me at all
I often overlook details in filling out forms, or forget to add attachments to emails.
so globally, to me it's "No", I'm a grammar nazi ,
even though I sometimes do typos
generally it's no, I feel better
I am easily distracted.
That, in my case, is really bad.
It is this symptom made me think a while ago that I have that troubled.
I find it difficult to stick with longer tasks.
Even Leisure activities.
Yes! it's true,
except Overwatch *laughs*
For this there's no symptom anymore!
Poor listner.
Oh I am such a bad listener that sucks
I find I am easily distracted during longer conversations. I tend to tune out.
It's horrible but so true
except when I'm with a bunch of people
then it's ok
True, I have trouble keeping on when there's a big discussion
I may be looking right at someone but I'm lost in thought. My mind often wanders.
It is so true, with the previous thing
it's my huge problem
I can't focus on something for a long time
I really can't
But when I focus, I do it 100%
I work really hard
but it can't last.
Even at school with homeworks.
I remember I worked for 30 minutes.
More I could'nt.
But I was Usain Bolt during those 30 minutes.
and I had OCT (careful, awkward)
I'd open my book like that... Well those  are Post-it it's a little crappy.
And I read out loud my lessons
And I had to walk around in circles
I'd do eight's
And when I would tell my lessons to my mom it had to do the same
It stressed her she'd tell me:"stop and sit down".
But if I sat down, I would not remember anything.
It really is hobbying what's happening.
Let's keep going!
I often miss what's being said. So I have to ask people to repeat themselves.
Ohh story of my life dude.
Everyday.
And you feel so bad when someone asks you.
To do something
you know the person insisted
but you can't remember.
even though you listened
and there you have to ask him/her to repeat
and you know that person will resent you
he/she will think you don't care
that you hate him/her
that you never listen
But it's not true!
And what's strange is that my brother has exactly the same problem.
And so when we speak about our lives
Lots of things are similar because
We have the same problems
It's astonishing with him
sometimes I tell him a story about something
And in fact it's he who told it to me in the first place
two days before but I forgot
and he does the same with me!
so these are dummies conversations
whereas we're young
and we listen to each other i don't know
it's why I really thought I was troubled years ago
Because eventually I'd nearly end to suffer of it.
And I know that people who have ADHD
Their symptoms might seems funny but in reality it it not, at all!
They suffer from it everyday
And furthermore they aren't always taken seriously by their surrounding
because they say that "hey everyone is a bit like you stop crying that much'...
BUT NO!
It"s a real disease!
They,  got it pushed to the extreme!
SO!
yeaaah, but, errr, it's not excessive
I think for this one, I'm pretty normal.
